Note: Please ensure the address and currency entered are correct as the transfer action cannot be undone.
You must use another account for the transfer
The address format is incorrect, please check
Transfer amount cannot exceed your balance
IMPORTANT: Please set a strong password to protect your private key and secure your transaction authorizations. Your wallet does not store any user information and your password cannot be recovered.
Name your wallet, e.g. My digital wallet
Name your wallet, e.g. My digital wallet
At least 8 characters, use a mix of letters, numbers and symbols
Maximum number of wallets has been reached
Your wallet has been created, back up the new wallet now.

Backup your wallet: To secure your mnemonic phrase, export them and write them down on paper. Do not save your mnemonic phrase online. You can test your wallet by transferring a small amount of funds.View tutorial in detail.
Separate each mnemonic by one space
The mnemonic entered is incorrect, please check
The Keystore file is not supported,Try importing the private key
Your password should contain no less than 8 characters
The passwords entered do not match, please try again
This wallet has already been added
Please directly copy the Keystore file of your Ethereum wallet or scan the generated QR code of the Keystore.
The private key is not standardized, please check
Wallet name cannot be left empty
New wallet name cannot be the same as the previous one
Please be cautious that this action cannot be undone!

Hardware and software can fail, be lost or stolen. Ensure that an automatic encrypted backup is made of your wallet to a location that you specify. HPB Wallet cannot recover any form of asset losses without your credentials.
Forget your password? Reset your password by using your mnemonic phrase or private key.
Password change failed, please try again
You must not enter the same passwords
Safety warning: Exporting your private key without encryption is risky. We suggest you use a mnemonic phrase and Keystore to back up your private key.
Please copy and paste your Keystore file to a safe and offline storage. Do not save your file in an email, online notebook, cloud storage or social messaging app.
Do not transmit your Keystore file on the Internet to prevent asset losses caused by hackers. We suggest offline transmission by using the QR code Scan.
For saving the file online, it is recommended to save your Keystore file with a cryptographic management software to ensure a higher security level, e.g.1Password.
Do not save, take screenshots or photos of the QR code, which is only used for users to import into the wallet by scanning under secure conditions.
Please use it in secure environment
Please check your surroundings when scanning QR code in case of any irrevocable asset losses.
Make sure your QR code is not shared publicly or stolen
Write down your wallet\'s mnemonic phrase
Failed to remove the mnemonic phrase
The format of your mnemonic phrase backup is not correct, choose again after verification!
Please confirm your wallet mnemonic phrase
Please click the mnemonic phrase in the right order to confirm your backup mnemonic phrase is correct.
Make sure your QR code is not shared publicly or stolen! Do not save the Keystore file or its corresponding QR code by taking screenshots or photos
Failed to generate Chinese QR code
You haven\'t got a wallet yet, would you like to create one now?
Please enter your password here to access
Wrong QR code, please scan the recipient code in the wallet
The qr code is not correct, please scan the ColdWallet to sign the qr code
Your mnemonic phrase have been verified, are you sure to remove this mnemonic phrase from your HPB wallet?
Anyone who has access to your private key can acquire your assets! Please write it down on paper and secure your private key in a safe location.
Anyone who have access to your mnemonic phrase can acquire your assets! Please write it down and secure your mnemonic phrase in case of any asset losses.
Mnemonic phrase is used to recover your wallet or reset your wallet password. Please make sure they are correctly written down and secured in a safe place.

Unlike traditional accounts, a Blockchain wallet is a decentralized cryptographic-based system. \nYou should secure your private key and transaction password of your wallet in case of any asset losses. \nWe recommend you to back up your private key and password and test your wallet by transferring a small amount of funds.
This file (private key) is generated in the format of HPB Wallet and encrypted by transaction password
It can help you recover your wallet when you lose your wallet or forget the password
We have received your feedback and will get back to you as soon as possible.
An updated version is available now! Click to update
An updated version is available now! \nTo continue to use this app, please update it to the latest version.
Oops, something went wrong. Please check the network and try again.
Please import your wallet for mapping first!
Got mapping wallet already? Click here
The map was successfully sent, please check later
Normal wallet set to map wallet failed
Wallet already exists, whether to set this wallet to map wallet？

The HPB Wallet was designed to be the main gateway to the HPB blockchain. The wallet is an easy-to-use mobile app providing users a secure and simple way to access HPB’s voting and store HPB digital assets.
Officially opened at 9:00 on August 28, 2018,\nEnds at 9:00 on August 31, 2018
The number of votes cannot be 0
The number of withdrawals cannot be 0
More than the maximum number of votes
More than the maximum number of withdrawals
The voting has not started yet
The main network is being maintained
Selected exchanges will do a tokenswap of the HPB token to HPB coin. Please monitor our HPB Facebook and Twitter accounts for information on participating exchanges.

1.The wallet addresses of HPB adopt the ECDSA (Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm). Based on the digital signature of ECDSA, the key used in the digital signature is the same as the wallet\'s public key (akin to Ethereum\'s implementation). It is recommended to use a wallet that supports ECDSA based currency to export the corresponding private key.
2.Using the HPB Wallet app, follow the steps as shown to complete the mapping after your HPB Wallet address is generated.
Note: Your ERC20 tokens will be burned and the new HPB address will be credited equal amounts of HPB coin within 48 hours.
3.After the mapping operation, you may check the mapping progress in “Transaction Records’’ of your wallet.
4.For detailed mapping instruction please refer to ‘‘Me’’; then ‘‘Help Center’’; then ‘‘Mapping Instructions.
The current phone has root privilege, and it is not safe to use the root phone for transaction. It is recommended to operate after changing the phone.
The current mobile phone is a virtual machine, the use of virtual phone transaction is not safe, it is recommended to replace the mobile phone operation.
HPB Wallet ONLY supports tokens that are native to the HPB platform (HPB tokens).
DO NOT transfer any assets from other blockchain platforms and their wallets (including ETH, ERC20 tokens, etc.) to the HPB Wallet!
HPB MainNet Wallet is completely separate from Ethereum and other blockchains, therefore their mnemonic phrases, address and tokens CANNOT be shared.
Transferring assets directly from other wallets and/or other tokens will lead to unrecoverable loss.
I have read and understood the above
Do not warn me about this again
Manage your digital assets \n and get all the latest news
Note: HPB does not support cross-chain transfer at this moment.
1.As HPB is independent from other blockchain platforms including Ethereum, cross-chain transfer is not permitted in case of any asset loss.
2. HPB Wallet only supports coins issued on HPB\'s MainNet.
Please back up your mnemonic phrase offline.
We suggest you write down your mnemonic phrase and keep it in a safe place.
Mnemonic phrase: a series of words used for identification and security purposes to help you recover your wallet
Back up the Keystore file: trade password-protected private key to help you recover your wallet.
Posted from the HPB Wallet App
Share HPB Wallet to your friends

The contact name cannot be longer than 20 words!
The contact address cannot be empty!

Secure your data on the cloud

You are about to enter a third-party application and agree to the User Agreement and Privacy Policy of the third-party application. A third party may request your wallet address, and your third-party use will be the responsibility of a third party.
1.Cold wallet is recommended when there are large amounts of assets.
2.Importing the cold wallet can only allow for transaction information broadcasting or checking the account holdings, not signatures or starting a transaction.

Send up to 100 red packets at a time
